title: AI-Driven Threat Detection Task Force
objective: To develop and implement advanced AI-driven threat detection systems that enhance real-time responses to AI-enhanced phishing attacks and secure organizational integrity.
timeline_phases: Phase 1: Needs Assessment and Scope Definition
Phase 2: Technology Evaluation and Vendor Selection
kpis: Reduction in successful phishing attacks by 50%
System response time to threats under 2 minutes
risks: Underestimation of system complexity creating delays
Potential data privacy and compliance issues
Evolving nature of phishing threats outpacing system development
